name: Candy Pieces
description:
Work quickly and strategically to complete as many candies as possible and take out neighbouring candies! If you run out of moves, use the unique twist function to get yourself out of danger!

Create as many candies as you can in Endless Mode, pit your skills against the clock in Timed Mode, or work your way through 40 progressively-difficult levels in Campaign Mode!

GAMEPLAY

Tap the outer circles to place the current candy piece. Once a candy has been completed it will be removed form the board along with the adjacent pieces. If you run out of moves tap the Twist button for a second chance. But beware - if you run out of Twists, it's game over!

For more information, please refer to the How to Play screens within the game.

FEATURES

  • Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
  • Multiple Playing Modes, including Endless and Timed!
  • 40 unlockable levels to master!
  • Intuitive touch-screen controls!
  • Catchy background music!
  • Fun particle effects!
  • Suitable for players of all ages!
